metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3530 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in GNU libiberty within demangle_path() in rust-demangle.c, as distributed in GNU Binutils version 2.36. A crafted symbol can cause stack memory to be exhausted leading to a crash.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> introduced in 2.36 eslerm> issue tracked as CVE-2021-46195 in gcc

criterions.comment: gdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
